Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
01.05.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
21.07.2011 SH SCR16535 Added group by LGCH_ID (to prevent duplicates) and added
test on user group <> 'IT_OPER' for updates on AUPR, UGRP, USUG
30.05.2011 SH SCR16491 Added test on CODE <> 'ACCESS' and <> 'SUPER' for updates
on AUPR, UGRP, USUG
-- Handle tables to merge simple unique ID's
-- Handle remaining tables
1. PI.TAB_PREFIX(Main) = DB Table name
2. PI.TAB_PREFIX(Sub) = incase of DB table name = ARCH ( --> HADH, HADC, ...)
3. PI.PRIMARYKEY_FIELDNAME = column name which has to be re-numbered
4. PI.SEQN_CODE = SEQN_CODE (could be diff. from DB table name, e.g. table FCBA)
5. PI.WHERE_CLAUSE (used e.g. for table ARCH, QUSR)
-- Create temp table to enable incremental update on TEMP_ID_NEW. Prevents using
of GB003 to calculate new sequence numbers
-- Additional updates
... Insert rows into DBME for all REPA rows with DBME_TAB_PREFIX = 'HATA'
-- Final updates
... switch to 999.999.999, used to avoid restarts for the same tab prefix

ExpSyntax.val: 'Insert into DBME, REPA rows with DBME_TAB_PREFIX = HATA'

SQL_STMT_U.val: create table :1/TEMP_:2 ( TEMP_TAB_PREFIX CHAR(4) NOT NULL , TEMP_ID_OLD DECIMAL(9, 0) NOT NULL , TEMP_ID_NEW INT NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH :3, INCREMENT BY 1, NO CACHE), CONSTRAINT :1/PK_TEMP_:2 PRIMARY KEY( TEMP_TAB_PREFIX , TEMP_ID_OLD ) )
insert into :1/DBME (DBME_TAB_PREFIX, DBME_ID_OLD, DBME_ID_NEW) select TEMP_TAB_PREFIX, TEMP_ID_OLD, TEMP_ID_NEW from :1/TEMP_:2
update :1/:2 set :4 = (select DBME_ID_NEW from :1/DBME where DBME_TAB_PREFIX = ':3' and DBME_ID_OLD = :4) :5
insert into :1/DBME (DBME_TAB_PREFIX, DBME_ID_OLD, DBME_ID_NEW) (select 'HATA', DBME_ID_OLD, DBME_ID_NEW from :1/DBME where DBME_TAB_PREFIX = 'REPA' and DBME_ID_OLD > 0)
update :1/AUPR set AUPR_UGRP_USERGROUP = ':2' || '_' || AUPR_UGRP_USERGROUP where AUPR_UGRP_USERGROUP<>'ACCESS' and AUPR_UGRP_USERGROUP<> 'SUPER' and AUPR_UGRP_USERGROUP<> 'IT_OPER'
update :1/AUTH set AUTH_DEPARTMENTROLE1 = AUTH_DEPARTMENTROLE1 +1000, AUTH_DEPARTMENTROLE2 = AUTH_DEPARTMENTROLE2 +1000
update :1/UGRP set UGRP_CODE = ':2' || '_' || UGRP_CODE where UGRP_CODE<>'ACCESS' and UGRP_CODE<>'SUPER' and UGRP_CODE<>'IT_OPER'
update :1/USUG set USUG_UGRP_CODE = ':2' || '_' || USUG_UGRP_CODE where USUG_UGRP_CODE<>'ACCESS' and USUG_UGRP_CODE<>'SUPER' and USUG_UGRP_CODE<>'IT_OPER'
